title: Exergyn sets new boundaries in solid-state refrigerant technology - PR Newswire
summary: Exergyn is pioneering solid-state cooling technology utilizing shape memory alloys (SMAs) to create a climate-friendly alternative to traditional refrigerants like hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs). The article highlights the potential of SMA technology to meet stricter HFC regulations globally while also promoting its use in various HVACR applications. Exergyn aims to lead the transition towards more sustainable cooling solutions.
